roleset.name: vulgar
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: arg1
example.text: We readily agree with the judge that the defendant's statement was "crude, unprofessional," and "vulgar,"

roleset.name: unrefined, rough, unprocessed
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: arg1
example.text: We were very young then and our thinking was crude.
example.note: I'm reading this as naivete, rather than vulgarity.

example.name: arg1
example.text: The testimony of one expert witness was taken on behalf of the Importers, from which It was shown that this substance was crude, and was an alkaloid...
